assets.filename: Goto next page- kill all other pages.xml

author: omgstfu
post_text: October 22, 2014 at 7:01â€¯PM#1I am writing a page + macro that will change to the next page, off everything from the previous executors and then select the first fader on the page. I am having trouble getting the first cue to fire though. I am trying to avoid using something like "go executor 10.1"  because the songs may not be in the same order every day so if I move pages and forget to update the macros I would fire the wrong cue. It would also mean I needed a separate macro for each page. Could someone help me out?
title: Executing the first cue on the current selected fader.
